thread.title: Jeff A RoosKi
thread.title_full: Poorstar | Lifestyle clothing brand influenced by extreme sports. reviewed by Jeff A RoosKi

author: Jeff A RoosKi
title: Jeff A RoosKi
text: Man, everything from the clothing to what the brand even stands for is so fvckin rad!!! The meaning of coming from nothing and making something of yourself relates 100% to my life!!! Then add the quality of the clothing and you've got something no one can compare to...the shirts are super durable, great for eating pavement a few times or even having your chick rip it off your back!!! The quality is everything I ever look for in a tshirt...plus the little details like the little tag on the bottom of the shirt make it authentic as fvck!!!
